title: 47.203 FEDERAL PREEMPTION OVERRIDE.
text: The provisions of Public Law 96-221, title V, part A, section 501(a)(1) (United States Code, title 12, section 1735f-7a), do not apply with respect to a loan, mortgage, credit sale or advance made in this state after June 2, 1981, nor with respect to a loan, mortgage, credit sale or advance secured by real property located in this state and made after June 2, 1981.
